titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Nevvport in the Isle of Wight, October 1648. In the time of the treaty. / By Robert Sanderson, D.D. chaplain to the late King, and Regius-Professor of Divinity in the University of Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Sanderson, Robert, 1587-1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T.M. for Andrew Crook, at the Green Dragon in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
